text: Te, kotoryye poklonyayutsya drugim bozhestvam [naryadu s Nim], skazhut: "Yesli by Allakh zakhotel, to ni my, ni nashi ottsy ne poklonyalis' by drugim bozhestvam i my ne zapreshchali by nichego [iz togo, chto On razreshil]". Takim zhe obrazom ne priznavali [poslannikov] te, kotoryye zhili do nikh, poka ne vkusili Nashego nakazaniya. Skazhi [, Mukhammad]: "Yest' li u vas khot' kakoye-libo znaniye [istiny]? Tak yavite nam yego. Vy postupayete lish' soglasno svoim dogadkam i govorite nepravdu
